text: (Kaṇavaṉ maṉaiviyākiya) iruvarukkuḷ (piṇakku ēṟpaṭṭu) piriviṉai ēṟpaṭṭuviṭumō eṉṟu nīṅkaḷ añciṉāl avaṉuṭaiya uṟaviṉarkaḷil oruvaraiyum, avaḷuṭaiya uṟaviṉarkaḷil oruvaraiyum naṭuvarkaḷāka nīṅkaḷ ēṟpaṭuttuṅkaḷ. (Naṭuvarkaḷākiya) avviruvarum camātāṉam ēṟpaṭutta virumpiṉāl kaṇavaṉ maṉaivi ivviruvaraiyum allāh oṟṟumaiyākki viṭuvāṉ. Niccayamāka allāh (aṉaivaraiyum) naṉkaṟintavaṉāka, naṉku kavaṉippavaṉāka irukkiṟāṉ
